concepttext: Providing housing and creating value for the inhabitants of Yaoundé, Douala and beyond. Since 2001, we have been carrying out sustainable real estate projects with personalised support, advancing with expertise and transparency as a trusted real estate partner.
promomain: Until 31 December 2025, SCI Hibiscus will cover 2% of the notary and land registry fees for eligible reservations.
promotext: Valid for the first 5 reservations on the properties selected below. Discount applied to the advertised purchase price, excluding parking fees. SCI Hibiscus reserves the right to make changes and sell early.
stat1text: Over twenty-four years of field expertise serving reliable, sustainable and controlled real estate projects.
stat2text: A high level of satisfaction based on trust and sustainable results.
stat3text: Un capital garantissant stabilité financière et capacité d’investissement long terme.
stat4text: Plus de deux cents projets livrés avec succès à Yaoundé et dans plusieurs autres villes stratégiques.
stat5text: Présence active à Yaoundé, Douala, Kribi, Bafoussam et Nkongsamba.
